document.docAuthor: Glowska, Eliza, Chrzanowski, Mateusz & Kaszewska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

. Type-species:

subSubSection.paragraph:
acrocephali Skoracki, 1999 : 160
, figs. 8â€“10 .

albicollisi Skoracki and Dabert, 2000 : 59
, figs. 1â€“10 .

Type material.
Holotype female at MRAC ( 140.508 ), paratypes : females, males, nymphs at MRAC , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Merops albicollis
( type host) ( Coraciiformes : Meropidae ), type-locality: TOGO , Odjolo (Skoracki & Dabert 2000 ).
Habitat. Unknown.

blaszaki Skoracki and Dabert, 1999 : 89
, figs. 1â€“7 .

); RUSSIA , ( ZISP ) (
Bochkov & Galloway 2001

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
turdi (
Fritsch, 1958
)
,
Syringophilus turdi
Fritsch, 1958
: 233

Syringophilopsis turdus ,
Kethley 1970
: 24
.
Type material.
Lost (
Kethley 1970
).

subSubSection.paragraph: Habitat. Secondary feathers.

Remark:
S. turdi
was also reported from
Chloris chloris
( Fringillidae ) from Germany by
Fritsch ( 1958 )
, but these specimens probably belong to
S. kirgizorum
described from the same host (Bochkov et al . 2000 ).
